str2: At one time or other, at some time, formerly. From the base of pou and te; indefinite adverb, at some time, ever.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
Apart from, separately from; without. Adverb from chora; at a space, i.e. Separately or apart from.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An ordinance, injunction, command, law. From entellomai; injunction, i.e. An authoritative prescription.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Feminine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To come to life again, revive, regain life. To recover life.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.
